rounds.name: General Knowledge
rounds.description: Test your broad knowledge of the world!

questions.text: What is the capital of France?
Which planet is known as the Red Planet?
What is the chemical symbol for Gold?
What is the chemical formula for water?
What is the largest ocean on Earth?
What is the hardest natural substance?
Who was the first person to walk on the moon?
Who painted the Mona Lisa?
What is the capital of Japan?
What is the symbol for Oxygen?
What is the largest mammal in the world?
How many continents are there?
What is the opposite of nocturnal?
At what temperature (Celsius) does water freeze?
How many colors are in a rainbow?
What year is it currently?
What is the capital of the United States?
Who is the alter ego of Batman?
What is the fastest land animal?
Which country invented pizza?

rounds.name: Math Whiz
rounds.description: Calculate fast or get left behind!

questions.text: What is 15 * 4?
What is the square root of 144?
What is 7 * 8?
What is 100 divided by 4?
What is 50 minus 18?
What is 12 squared?
What is 9 plus 10?
What is 33 divided by 3?
What is 5 * 5 * 5?
What is the square root of 64?
What is 20% of 100?
What is 1000 minus 1?
What is 45 plus 55?
What is 8 * 9?
How many degrees in a right angle?
How many sides does a hexagon have?
What is 2 to the power of 3?
What is 0 multiplied by 100?
What is 1 + 2 + 3?
What number does the Roman numeral V represent?
